report.title: Hearing Voices
report.author: Bryan
report.bodytext: I abused diphenhydramine and dimenhydrinate on a regular basis w/ and without DXM for about 1-1/2 to 2 years. Ever since then I hear voices every day, the same way I hear them when I am on a dramamine trip. I recommend to never abuse either of these substances because hearing voices every day sucks.
